### Notice Type and Arrangement
* The notice type is a (REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL)
* The arrangement is a Competitive - Selective tendering method

### Description of Requirement
Indigenous Services Canada is seeking to establish a contract for External Audit Services under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement to support the audit of Norman Wells Proven Area and Audit of Norman Wells Trust Funds.

### Evaluation Method
* The evaluation method for this tender is based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Tender Participation and Pre-Qualification
* Only pre-qualified Suppliers for Stream 5 (External Audit) against the PASS Supply Arrangement (E60ZQ-180001) are eligible to participate
